course_title: Transforming Healthcare: A Systems Approach to Improve Quality & Safety
course_description: Students will gain knowledge, skills, and attitudes to participate/lead efforts for improving quality, safety, and patient-centered care using a systems framework to assess relevant contextual factors and to identify implications for quality improvement and system redesign initiatives.
prerequisites: NRSG 715D or equivalent transfer credit as co-requisite. Students must enroll in NRSG 715D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 6477, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
